refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the decibel equivalent of the raw amplitude x.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the decibel equivalent of the raw amplitude x.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the dbamp opcode. It uses the file dbamp.csd.
Example of the dbamp opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
Its output should include lines like this: instr 1: idb = 40.000 instr 1: idb = 60 instr 1: idb = 80 instr 1: idb = 86.021
